articles.title: OTT releases this week: From Chittha to Mission Raniganj; movies, web series to watch over the weekend | Mint - Mint
articles.description: OTT releases this week: Several movies and web series including Family Switch, Mission Raniganj, Chittha and Zara Hatke Zara Bachke are releasing on platforms like Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, Disney+ Hotstar and JioCinema.
